148    <script>
149    (function () {
150        window.TypechoComment = {
151            dom : function (id) {
152                return document.getElementById(id);
153            },
154            create : function (tag, attr) {
155                var el = document.createElement(tag);
156                for (var key in attr) {
157                    el.setAttribute(key, attr[key]);
158                }
159                return el;
160            },
161            reply : function (cid, coid) {
162                var comment = this.dom(cid), parent = comment.parentNode,
163                    response = this.dom('<?php echo $this->respondId(); ?>'),
164                    input = this.dom('comment-parent'),
165                    form = 'form' == response.tagName ? response : response.getElementsByTagName('form')[0],
166                    textarea = response.getElementsByTagName('textarea')[0];
167                if (null == input) {
168                    input = this.create('input', {
169                        'type' : 'hidden',
170                        'name' : 'parent',
171                        'id'   : 'comment-parent'
172                    });
173                    form.appendChild(input);
174                }
175                input.setAttribute('value', coid);
176                if (null == this.dom('comment-form-place-holder')) {
177                    var holder = this.create('div', {
178                        'id' : 'comment-form-place-holder'
179                    });
180                    response.parentNode.insertBefore(holder, response);
181                }
182                comment.appendChild(response);
183                this.dom('cancel-comment-reply-link').style.display = '';
184                if (null != textarea && 'text' == textarea.name 
185    
186    ) {
187                    textarea.focus();
188                }
189                return false;
190            },
191            cancelReply : function () {
192                var response = this.dom('<?php echo $this->respondId(); ?>'),
193                holder = this.dom('comment-form-place-holder'),
194                input = this.dom('comment-parent');
195                if (null != input) {
196                    input.parentNode.removeChild(input);
197                }
198                if (null == holder) {
199                    return true;
200                }
201                this.dom('cancel-comment-reply-link').style.display = 'none';
202                holder.parentNode.insertBefore(response, holder);
203                return false;
204            }
205        };
206    })();
207    </script>

 2function showThumbnail($widget)
 3{ 
 4    // å½“æ–‡ç« æ— å›¾ç‰‡æ—¶çš„é»˜è®¤ç¼©ç•¥å›¾
 5    $rand = rand(1,5); // éšæœº 1-5 å¼ ç¼©ç•¥å›¾

 8
 9    $attach = $widget->attachments(1)->attachment;
10    $pattern = '/\<img.*?src\=\"(.*?)\"[^>]*>/i'; 
11    
12
13if (preg_match_all($pattern, $widget->content, $thumbUrl)) {

18        echo $random;

20}

ç„¶åæˆ‘è§‰å¾—å†å»æŠŠç™¾åº¦çš„Typechoç›®å½•å¼„æ¥å°±okäº†ï¼Œä½†è°èƒ½æƒ³åˆ°é‚£ä»£ç æœ‰Bugï¼Œè¿˜æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å…¶å®ƒçš„äº†ï¼Œäºæ˜¯å°±è‡ªå·±æ”¹äº†æ”¹ï¼Œå…·ä½“æ–¹æ³•å·²ç»å†™åœ¨ä¸Šç¯‡æ–‡ç« äº†Typechoæ— æ’ä»¶å®ç°ç›®å½•æ ‘

 1function createCatalog($obj) {
 2    $obj = preg_replace_callback('/<h([1-6])(.*?)>(.*?)<\/h\1>/i', function ($obj) {
 3        global $catalog;
 4        global $catalog_count;
 5        $catalog_count++;
 6        $catalog[] = array('text' => trim(strip_tags($obj[3])), 'depth' => $obj[1], 'count' => $catalog_count);
 7        return '<h'.$obj[1].$obj[2].'>'.$obj[3].'</h'.$obj[1].'>';
 8    }, $obj);
 9    return $obj;
10}
11
12function getCatalog() {
13    global $catalog;
14    $index = '';
15    if ($catalog) {
16        $index = '<ul>' . "\n";
17        $prev_depth = '';
18        $to_depth = 0;
19        foreach ($catalog as $catalog_item) {
20            $catalog_depth = $catalog_item['depth'];
21            if ($prev_depth) {
22                if ($catalog_depth == $prev_depth) {
23                    $index .= '</li>' . "\n";
24                } elseif ($catalog_depth > $prev_depth) {
25                    $to_depth++;
26                    $index .= '<ul>' . "\n";
27                } else {
28                    $to_depth2 = ($to_depth > ($prev_depth - $catalog_depth)) ? ($prev_depth - $catalog_depth) : $to_depth;
29                    if ($to_depth2) {
30                        for ($i = 0; $i < $to_depth2; $i++) {
31                            $index .= '</li>' . "\n" . '</ul>' . "\n";
32                            $to_depth--;
33                        }
34                    }
35                    $index .= '</li>';
36                }
37            }
38            $index .= '<li><a href="#'. $catalog_item['text'] .'">' . $catalog_item['text'] . '</a>';
39            $prev_depth = $catalog_item['depth'];
40        }
41        for ($i = 0; $i <= $to_depth; $i++) {
42            $index .= '</li>' . "\n" . '</ul>' . "\n";
43        }
44       
45            
46    }
47    echo $index;
48}
